name: Lucky Forest
description:
My first game jam game.  Pretty busy week, didn't turn out as I had in mind. Happy to get something uploaded, the next one will be better.  I am not to happy with the game, but I am happy to have participated and learned the process for submitting.

Any feedback is welcome.  The idea is that you don't complete the level unless you gain enough luck. Since it is a speed run game you have to decide on going slower and getting more luck or just going straight for the goal.
